Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『エレノア王妃像』 前代ラドラス王のお后、 エレノア王妃の在りし日を 描いた肖像画。 世継ぎを産んだ王妃はなぜか 若くして逝去する事が多いという。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Portrait of Queen Eleanor - A portrait of the late King Ladras's wife Eleanor, drawn while she was still alive. They say that there have been many queens who have suffered an untimely death after bearing an heir.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『エレノア王妃像』 前代ラドラス王のお后、 エレノア王妃の在りし日を 描いた肖像画。 世継ぎを産んだ王妃はなぜか 若くして逝去する事が多いという。 <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>と関連があるという 説もある。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Portrait of Queen Eleanor - A portrait of the late King Ladras's wife Eleanor, drawn while she was still alive. They say that there have been many queens who have suffered an untimely death after bearing an heir. There is a theory that the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White> might be responsible.
